name: localstorage-fs
description: node's fs module for the browser backed by localStorage

scripts.example: browserify example/index.js > example/bundle.js && { [ -x "$(which open)" ] && open example/index.html || xdg-open example/index.html; }
scripts.test: browserify test/index.js > test/bundle.js && { [ -x "$(which open)" ] && open test/index.html || xdg-open test/index.html; }

author: Jesse Tane <jesse.tane@gmail.com>
